Summary: Corroborating earlier report "Brilliant green object possible emits second white object."
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband, son and myself were outside in our backyard last night and witnessed this same event, exactly the same including the apparent meteor. This is what I posted earlier today to my friends and family - We had a fire in the backyard, and saw a very bright light low on the southern horizon. It moved slowly toward the east, then stopped, brightened a LOT, then dimmed to almost nothing, brightened a LOT again and disappeared. Probably was engaging warp drive :) Then a couple of minutes later, saw another one moving from south to northeast, thought maybe it was a plane but very high up. Then it brightened a LOT, dimmed, moved a bit further to the northeast then stopped and brightened up a LOT, then stayed put for a long time.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There was one other sighting in Riverside on or around July 31st 2010
